body_content.explanation: a nut with a slightly bitter taste, a series of folds in it, and a hard shell:
examples: The black walnuts made a thudding sound when they landed on the flat roof.
He chopped up some black walnuts to add to the salad.

body_content.explanation: a tall deciduous tree (= one that loses its leaves in autumn and grows new ones in the spring) on which black walnuts grow:
examples: The black walnut had to be taken down and cut into panels at the sawmill.
She suggested planting black walnut along roads to absorb pollutants.

body_content.explanation: the expensive, dark brown wood of the black walnut tree:
examples: A beautifully made black walnut dresser was the centrepiece of the room.
The coffee table was made from black walnut.
